title: Habenaria blephariglottis- White Fringed Orchid and Habenaria ciliaris- Orange Fringed Orchid, #26 from "Orchids of the North Eastern United States"
description: long, thin stem at R with large leaves; two shorter long, thin stems at L, topped with multiple dark-colored blossoms; light ground
creditline: Gift of Richard and Susan Nunley
